contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|UAR}} '''UAR''' may refer to: * [[Uar]], a tribe in Central Asia and China. * [[Understanding Animal Research]], a British advocacy group formed from the merger of the Research Defence Society and the Coalition for Medical Progress. * [[United Arab Republic]], the state formed by the union of the republics of Egypt and Syria in 1958. It existed until Syria's secession in 1961, although Egypt continued to be known as the UAR until 1971. * [[Argentine Rugby Union]] (Spanish: ''UniÃ³n Argentina de Rugby''), the official governing body of rugby union in Argentina. * [[Union of African Railways]], an organization of African railways. * [[Aerostar Airlines]] (ICAO code:UAR), a Ukrainian airline. {{disambig}}
